About this item

  • Fry yakiniku BBQ grilled meat slices in your home without worrying about smoke. Eat like you’re dining at a yakiniku restaurant.
  • By keeping the surface plate temperature between 410° to 482°F (210° - 250°C), the fat from the meat will not be able to create any smoke.Also, instead of meat fat dripping directly onto the fire, it flows outward and drips into a water filled tray, which in turn prevents any additional smoke from generating.
  • The plate is fluorine processed which makes it non-stick for easy cleaning.
  • Its compact size will not take up too room on the table and it also saves space when storing.
  • Product size (W x D x H): 11.9 x 10.9 x 5.9 inches (303 x 278 x 149 mm), Outer plate diameter: 9.2 inches (233 mm); Product weight: Approx. 4.4 lbs (2 kg); Color: Bronze and black; Materials: Main: Steel plating, Plate: Die cast aluminum, Water tray: Steel plating, Burner: Heat resistant die cast aluminum, Ignition knob: ABS plastic; Maximum heating volume: 1.0 kW (900 kcal/h), Continuous burning time: Approx. 217 minutes (The actual measurement of time taken until gas canister is used up when continuously burning on high flame at a room temperature between 68.0 to 77.0°F (20 to 25°C)); Ignition method: Piezoelectric ignition; Safety device: Pressure sensing safety device; Canister attachment method: Magnetic; Gas used: Iwatani gas canisters; Made in Japan; *Gas canisters sold separately.
  • Gas canisters sold separately.

How are ratings calculated?
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness.

Amazon Customer
5 Stars
ゆっくりと焼肉が楽しめます
従来は同じメーカーのガスコンロと焼き肉プレートを使用していました。火力が強く早く食べないとすぐに焦げてしまい、煙も臭いも強かったです。この商品は火力が少し弱くて、材料がすぐに焦げてしまうことがありません。野菜も程よく火が通り、肉も焼き加減が簡単に調整できます。ゆっくりと焼き肉が楽しめます。煙・臭いも非常に少なく、以前は終わってからも換気扇を30分以上回していましたが、10分位ですんでいます。ただ、着火状態が見にくくて着火時に少し不安になります。横の小穴から見るしかなく、非常に見にくいです。

Reviewed in Japan on April 8, 2024
Verified Purchase
従来は同じメーカーのガスコンロと焼き肉プレートを使用していました。
火力が強く早く食べないとすぐに焦げてしまい、煙も臭いも強かったです。
この商品は火力が少し弱くて、材料がすぐに焦げてしまうことがありません。
野菜も程よく火が通り、肉も焼き加減が簡単に調整できます。
ゆっくりと焼き肉が楽しめます。
煙・臭いも非常に少なく、以前は終わってからも換気扇を30分以上回していましたが、10分位ですんでいます。
ただ、着火状態が見にくくて着火時に少し不安になります。
横の小穴から見るしかなく、非常に見にくいです。

chia-ying liao
5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! Grilling indoor in -20. No smoke, no problem!
Reviewed in Canada on January 20, 2024
Verified Purchase
Love this little grill for indoor use. Got the gas canister from Canadian Tire and some nice cut meat from the grocery store. Plus did some marinate and everything was ready to go.
Clean-up was super easy as well. Hot water with little soap. It looks as new as before.
The only "issue" might be its size. I use this for myself and maybe one more person only, so the space is good enough. I can see that it might be hard if using it for a party.
Anyway, love this impulsive buy

K.C. L.
5.0 out of 5 stars Goede grill voor 2 personen
Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 5, 2023
Verified Purchase
De grill is aan de prijzige kant maar de moeite waard om thuis vlees met de yakiniku manier te bereiden. Het vlees gaart langzaam (evt. is een hogere vlam/temperatuur instelbaar) maar met de lagere temperatuur kan je langer van je eten genieten en is er minder rookontwikkeling. Over rook gesproken, deze grill is niet rook vrij maar de woonkamer stonk minder lang naar rook dan wanneer er een normale grill is gebruikt.

De handleiding is in het Japans maar de werking spreekt voor zich, zo niet dan zijn er Youtube videos die het gebruik uitleggen.

5.0 out of 5 stars Rauchfreies Grillen indoor
Reviewed in Germany on May 18, 2021
Verified Purchase
Durch den Wasserbehälter verbrennt tropfendes Fett nicht mehr in der Flamme, so dass dieser Yakinikogrill auch problemlos in Innenräumen genutzt werden kann. Die fluoridbeschichtete Grillplatte lässt auch bei sehr hohen Temperaturen nichts anbrennen und wird in kürzester Zeit heiß. Der Preis ist exorbitant hoch, aber es funktioniert tadellos. Durch das geringe Gewicht lässt sich der Grill auch gut unterwegs nutzen.
